column4: A reminder that my next Tele-Town Hall is this Thursday, 10/8 at 6pm. You can find info on how to join & updates on the ongoing #COVID19 public health & economic crisis in my latest #PA17 newsletter:  https://t.co/YYG8ubeqpg https://t.co/IB5gKGHE3A
We need a bipartisan #COVID19 relief bill that can be signed into law. Read my full statement below.  #PA17 https://t.co/nssGziOIdl

Today the House passed a comprehensive, bipartisan bill to give the VA new tools & resources to address the veteran suicide crisis & ensure that our veterans have access to the best health care. #PA17 https://t.co/G4SECye9Fj https://t.co/buObIotkRp
May the sounds of the shofar ring in a peaceful and healthy new year for all who celebrate. Happy Rosh Hashanah! #PA17

The men & women of organized labor built our nation, teach our kids, protect our communities & serve as essential workers on the frontlines of #COVID19. Congress must fight to safeguard the wages, benefits & rights of working people across America. #LaborDay #PA17

One more veteran lost to suicide is one too many.

This week I introduced three bipartisan bills to increase veterans’ access to integrative health care & mental health services to combat the veteran suicide crisis. #PA17 https://t.co/N8rsKX2CEE

The $4.3 million federal grant provided to @BeaverCoTransit through the bipartisan #CARESAct will help meet the critical transportation needs of local communities in Beaver during the  #COVID19 public health crisis. #PA17 https://t.co/4gQ84zwtAk
Today I introduced the bipartisan SERVE Act with @DrNealDunnFL2 to remove obstacles for veterans to serve our communities during the #COVID19 public health crisis. #PA17 https://t.co/lPZApbDR9u

Starting next week Beaver County small businesses & non-profits are eligible to apply for grants of up to $25k under the #CARESAct to help with #COVID19 related costs.

https://t.co/BniReO7pWb

Check out my latest newsletter for an update on the next #COVID19 legislative package & to catch up on what I’ve been working on this summer to keep the country moving forward. #PA17 https://t.co/o3P0vOWzya

Too many families in #PA17 are struggling to afford childcare during this pandemic. The bipartisan SAFE Kids & Jobs Act is commonsense legislation designed to get money for care into the hands of working families as quickly as possible. https://t.co/tRWMqyknuL

Congress must provide significant funding to help schools meet the challenges posed by #COVID19. I joined a bipartisan group of Members calling for $13 billion in the next emergency legislative package for schools to support students w/ disabilities. #PA17 https://t.co/gDMP9YlTfg
Today the House passed a bipartisan Defense spending bill that included a 3% raise for our troops & $1 billion for pandemic preparedness.

Too many people still haven’t gotten their #COVID19 $1,200 Congress provided. This is unacceptable & should be fixed. Today I led an effort to ensure everyone in #PA17 receives their money. If you need help, please contact my office at 412-344-5583. https://t.co/1oyZgX8D1m
Wishing you all a healthy & safe 4th of July. #PA17 https://t.co/KgDJilmttz

We must do more to protect nursing home residents & healthcare workers during #COVID19. Thanks to Dr. Patricia Gennari from western PA for sharing her family’s story during today’s Congressional Task Force on Aging roundtable. #PA17 https://t.co/ZjXwHWf79f

Congress must do more to help transitioning service members & veterans. Today I joined @RepBrianFitz & @unionveterans in calling for more support for veterans & their families facing the economic impact of #COVID19. #PA17 https://t.co/9bon3BiLwy

Good discussion with @TheBCCCC on what we can do in Washington to help local businesses address #COVID19 & our efforts to get our economy moving again as Beaver County enters the green phase. #PA17 https://t.co/npLJS55iDU

Public transportation is vital to people & communities across #PA17. Through the bipartisan CARES Act @PGHtransit has been awarded a $141 million federal grant to help with the challenges of #COVID19. https://t.co/KjBLzBU9kC

I’m hosting my next Tele Town Hall on Thursday, June 4 at 4pm to provide updates & answer questions about the #COVID19 public health crisis in #PA17. Sign up here: https://t.co/6sRpxMIUjS https://t.co/NPk3XCjs7z

More than 40k National Guard members have been deployed to help communities across the U.S. struggling to address #COVID19, including right here in #PA17. We have a responsibility to these servicemembers to provide the benefits they have earned & deserve. https://t.co/B9fGmIvPAr

We know that #COVID19 is impacting veterans & their families.  Congress has a responsibility to help those who have fought for & served our nation get through this crisis. #PA17 https://t.co/XiFd6Rxuhr

We need to invest in infrastructure projects that will spur our economy & protect good paying jobs.  @RepBobGibbs & I led 135 Members of Congress in calling for more transportation & infrastructure spending in the next #COVID relief package. #PA17 https://t.co/b8BOztA0Wp

@CMSGov The dangers posed by #COVID19 are bad enough. It is unacceptable that the threat to the residents of Brighton was made worse by lax oversight after more than 60 members of our community had died. Something needs to change at Brighton, and it needs to change right away.

Lots of thoughtful questions from the students in Mr. Barsic’s class @RochesterASD.  It’s great to see the students & teachers in #PA17 adapting to this new learning environment during #COVID19. https://t.co/gMBfMDJVL6

TODAY AT 4PM: I'm hosting a #COVID19 TeleTown Hall for Beaver Co. residents featuring guest speakers @PAHealthDept Deputy Secretary, @seiuhcpa President & Beaver County Commissioners. To participate call 855-962-1081 or listen online at https://t.co/zl1qO6m6kl. #PA17

.@USDOT awarded @PITairport a $36m grant under the bipartisan #CARESAct so our region can continue to bring FEMA & cargo flights delivering critical PPE supplies to combat #COVID19. Congress needs to ensure more funding for essential transportation & infrastructure projects #PA17 https://t.co/dCt1L3RByv

REMINDER: I'm hosting a #COVID19 TeleTown Hall for Beaver Co. residents on Thurs 4/30 at 4pm. I’ll be joined by local Beaver County Commissioners & @PAHealthDept Deputy Secretary. Sign up here: https://t.co/9MgFzCQmWf #PA17

I’m hosting a Tele Town Hall to provide updates & answer questions about the #COVID19 pandemic response in Beaver Co. on Thursday, 4/30 at 4pm w/ @PAHealthDept Dep. Secretary, Health Preparedness & Community Protection, Ray Barishansky. Sign up here: https://t.co/6sRpxMIUjS #PA17

Today the President signed the latest bipartisan bill to provide additional funding for small businesses, health care providers & more testing. Visit my website & read the #COVID19 FAQ to learn more about what this means for #PA17: https://t.co/8XbQxZbkbI

Congress provided $100 billion for hospitals & healthcare providers to address #COVID19. $1.2 billion in direct grants to hospitals & providers across PA & in #PA17 starting today. An important first step, but we must do more.
If you haven’t had a chance to sign up online for my Tele Town Hall on the #COVID19 public health crisis, you can call in directly at 855-962-1081 TODAY AT 4PM. #PA17

REMINDER: Today at 4pm I’m hosting a Tele Town Hall for #PA17 & will be joined by @ACE_Fitzgerald & @HealthAllegheny Director Dr. Debra Bogen to answer your questions about the #COVID19 public health crisis. Click here to sign up: https://t.co/9MgFzCQmWf

Tomorrow (Monday, 4/6) at 4pm, I’m hosting a Tele Town Hall for #PA17 & will be joined by @ACE_Fitzgerald & @HealthAllegheny Director Dr. Debra Bogen to provide updates & answer your questions about the #COVID19 public health crisis. Click here to sign up: https://t.co/9MgFzCyLxF

Congress has taken action to help workers, small biz, hospitals & first responders confronting the #COVID19 crisis. Visit my website for info & answers to FAQ to help understand what it all means for you. #PA17 https://t.co/Px7ZO0Aw4f
Today Congress passed the bipartisan #CARESAct to provide $2 trillion to working families, small businesses & frontline workers to address the #COVID19 pandemic #PA17 https://t.co/yuPeDbcGrc
Today I spoke on the House Floor to support the bipartisan CARES Act which provides emergency relief to all Americans during this public health crisis. #PA17 https://t.co/K4Wkt9j4wo

Congress must act to get protective equipment for our healthcare workers & first responders on the frontlines of this pandemic. There is no time to waste, they need our help now. #PA17 https://t.co/V3lEUaeGgo

Important info from federal, state & local agencies & organizations on the #COVID19 response & resources available on my website, we will update regularly as the situation evolves. Read my latest newsletter for information & links: https://t.co/rbaY9iU0kV #PA17

The President has signed bipartisan legislation to help families w/ sick leave, provide tax credits for employers, increase funding for Medicaid & ensure free #COVID19 tests. We have more to do, especially for workers & small businesses during this public health emergency. #PA17

We all need to do our part to limit the spread of #COVID19.  Starting tomorrow my #PA17 office locations are indefinitely closed to the public. My staff will telework & serve constituents virtually, answering calls & voicemails, emails & online requests. https://t.co/mhkLpTZW2o

The bipartisan legislation I voted to pass last night was an important step in our national response to this health emergency but we still have a lot of work to do to ease the burden of this pandemic on families. Read my full statement here: https://t.co/rBrL6U4QtH #PA17
Closely monitoring the #COVID19 situation & following all guidance recommended by @CDCgov. Click here for updates including Capitol & White House Tour closure info: https://t.co/faOVRfgUmd #PA17

Visited with the residents & caregivers at @VincentianPGH today to hear about how they are dealing with #COVID19 & how we can work together to reduce the risk of spread among the senior community. For more resources & information click here: https://t.co/lk3tNe4Hja #PA17 https://t.co/BPMiDPBUsf

Today the House passed a bipartisan coronavirus measure to provide $8.3 billion in funding for research & development of a vaccine & support for the local & state public health agencies protecting our communities. #PA17 https://t.co/N7ApR1SN3k

It is important to have accurate information as we learn more about #COVID19 and steps we can all take to reduce our risk. My latest newsletter has resources & information to help you stay informed: https://t.co/OCZtCzT1Lm #PA17
If you’re looking for up-to-date information on #COVID19, including preparedness measures, take a look at this resource from @CDCgov: https://t.co/WP4KWMiSKo #PA17 https://t.co/aEM2yxWQA1

This week I urged @SecWilkie to ensure that the health of our Vietnam era veterans exposed to #AgentOrange is a top @DeptVetAffairs priority.  We owe these veterans that much, and time is running out. #PA17 https://t.co/66RuwM0KR7
Happy Rosh Hashanah! Wishing you a new year full of peace, happiness, and good health.  L'shanah Tovah

Our rivers are vital to the economic health of SWPA.  Today we showcased our critical infrastructure needs, including the Montgomery Locks & Dam to @RepMarcyKaptur  Energy/Water Subcommittee Chair for @AppropsDems  along with @PittsburghUSACE, @portpitt & @GPghCC . #PA17 https://t.co/l4XC3PpUvK

Great time today connecting with veterans throughout #PA17. Closed out the day at the @VVAmerica Chapter 862 summer picnic in @BeaverCtyPA talking to Vietnam veterans about the Blue Water Navy Act & other issues affecting their health & well-being. https://t.co/ifrZyAJ25K

Volunteers serve our veterans every day in @VeteransHealth facilities across the nation & today I met some of the best located here in #PA17. Thanks to the staff, residents & volunteers at @VAPittsburgh H.J. Heinz campus for hosting me today for afternoon activities. #B-I-N-G-O https://t.co/tUGdOIh7al

Had a very informative day meeting with health care professionals throughout the region. Thanks to the team at @AHNtoday for hosting my last visit of the day & providing me with insight into emergency & trauma care. #PA17 https://t.co/e397dmdIdx

Thanks to the nurses & staff at Heritage Valley Health System in @BeaverCtyPA for a great discussion today about the need to invest in education & training to ensure proper care & resources for the medical professionals on the frontline of health care. #PA17 https://t.co/gURqLEGzB8

Great meetings with AFGE Local 1793 as well as staff & leadership at @VAPhiladelphia & Allentown VA clinic to get updates on MISSION Act implementation & hear about @DeptVetAffairs opioid research & women’s health initiatives. @VetAffairsDems https://t.co/eShOD4A7IM
It’s time to raise the minimum wage and lower health care costs for people who work hard but still struggle to make ends meet. #PA17 https://t.co/dGqraruFdS

Had a great time today with the seniors at Body & Soul Health and Wellness Senior Center in @SharpsburgBoro. I look forward to coming back to play some cards with you all. #PA17 https://t.co/HsjH5xR30K
Visited @VAButlerPA to see the @DeptVetAffairs Whole Veteran program in action today, providing veterans more choices & greater power to manage their own healthcare. #PA17 https://t.co/1Kx5aKM7xK
Great to see Mayor Tom Murphy last evening & hear from you all about the great economic & community development happening with the @BeaverFallsCDC. #PA17 https://t.co/nWlx8rePGm

Today, the House unanimously passed my bipartisan bill the Whole Veteran Act in partnership with @RepBrianFitz and @RepTimRyan. This important legislation helps to give veterans a real choice & greater power to manage their own healthcare. #PA17 https://t.co/ovxMs6cYiq

We have a responsibility to ensure the mental health and well-being of all our veterans -- because one veteran lost is one too many. The Whole Veteran Act is important legislation that is vital to the VA’s suicide prevention program. #PA17 https://t.co/dOYgOkcUxW

Social security is not an entitlement. American workers invest from their paychecks over a lifetime to receive benefits that ensure basic health & well-being. Let’s pass #Secure2100 into law and ensure workers get the benefits they’ve earned. #PA17 https://t.co/hNWU9e4tgB

The annual Disability & Mental Health Summit tackles critical topics & issues that can bring more resources to families in #PA17. Thanks to @RepDanMiller  for hosting me & @USRepMikeDoyle @ Beth El Congregation today. https://t.co/GgvS4yzrng

The Open Enrollment deadline for the health care marketplace is quickly approaching on December 15, 2018. In many cases, financial assistance is available. Check out my latest newsletter to learn more about how to enroll: https://t.co/PfmYP9nlgl #PA18

The Open Enrollment period for the health care marketplace has begun and runs through December 15, 2018. In many cases, financial assistance is available. To learn more, enroll in a plan or make changes to an existing plan visit https://t.co/EoZHV3DWM3. #PA18

The SUPPORT Act is a an important step in the battle against the heroin & opioid epidemic in Western PA, but we have a lot more to do. We need to work together and respond to this crisis with the urgency it demands. #PA18 https://t.co/Bkpu7EV4Ry

We should be working together to make health care & prescription drugs more affordable. People suffering from a preexisting condition shouldn’t have to live in fear of losing their coverage or see their premiums go through the roof. #PA18 https://t.co/sq0i077r2X

Toured @CDCgov @NIOSH facility w/ @USRepMikeDoyle to learn about research happening in region to protect hardworking Americans from work-related injury or illness -- whether it’s keeping miners safe or protecting first responders on the front line of the opioid crisis.  #PA18 https://t.co/PFO1SOTFNu

Caring for veterans is top priority as we create a more efficient healthcare system @VeteransHealth. Honored to be appointed Ranking Member of new @HouseVetAffairs Subcommittee on Technology Modernization, to help veterans in SW PA & across the U.S. #PA18
https://t.co/ysuDmaPvlQ

Meet our new summer intern, Coco. I am committed to supporting animal welfare issues and am a co-sponsor of both the Preventing Animal Cruelty and Torture (PACT) Act and the Humane Cosmetics Act to help stop animal abuse and inhumane testing practices. #PA18 https://t.co/mnb4bxCQhZ

Today the House passed my bipartisan bill with @RepGrothman creating a federal task force to streamline our response to the heroin epidemic. When we work together & stay focused on getting things done, we can find common ground & make real progress on our priorities. #PA18 https://t.co/jWkT3AfZuw

As we take bipartisan action in Congress this week to fight the opioid epidemic, I held a roundtable discussion yesterday with experts @WestmdCountyPA Dept of Human Services, @WestmorelandCA @MySaintVincent @HighlandsHos Center of Excellence & MedMark to discuss solutions. #PA18 https://t.co/Ed68KL9UHP

Tonight I will oppose legislation to cut $7 billion in funding to support Children’s Health Insurance Program (CHIP). Outrageous that it’s even being considered, and both parties should reject it. This isn’t the work we were sent here to do. #PA18

Fentanyl is fueling record overdoses & endangering law enforcement officers on the frontlines of the heroin epidemic in Western PA. My bipartisan POWER Act will give first responders the tools to better protect themselves & the public. #PA18 
https://t.co/S8b3fSaAAa
